title: SMC_SMOOTHBSPLINE_MODE (Enum)
text:
TYPE SMC_SMOOTHBSPLINE_MODE :
The mode determines how
SMC_SmoothBSpline
determines the knot vectors.

rows.Name: SMC_SMOOTHBSPLINE_CHORDLENGTH
rows.Comment:
Distance of knots proportional to chord length between
control points

rows.Name: SMC_SMOOTHBSPLINE_CENTRIPETAL
rows.Comment:
Distance of knots proportional to square root of chord
length between control points
